title: Feature Request: Dense to Sparse and Dense to Sparse Tensor Ops
body_html: I think it would be helpful if there is a dense_to_sparse op in Tensorflow for ops like ctc_loss that requires sparse labels. I'm not really sure where else it can be used aside from that but in case only ctc_loss uses it, I think it would help if dense labels can be passed into ctc_loss and do the conversion within.
body_text: I think it would be helpful if there is a dense_to_sparse op in Tensorflow for ops like ctc_loss that requires sparse labels. I'm not really sure where else it can be used aside from that but in case only ctc_loss uses it, I think it would help if dense labels can be passed into ctc_loss and do the conversion within.
body: I think it would be helpful if there is a dense_to_sparse op in Tensorflow for ops like `ctc_loss` that requires sparse labels. I'm not really sure where else it can be used aside from that but in case only `ctc_loss` uses it, I think it would help if dense labels can be passed into `ctc_loss` and do the conversion within.
